    • Uses of Group in space.arim.perms.api

      Methods in space.arim.perms.api that return Group 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Group GroupManager.getGroup(String id)
      Gets a Group by id, creating a new group if the specified group is not tracked.
      @Nullable Group GroupManager.getPossibleGroup(String id)
      Gets a possible group by id
      Methods in space.arim.perms.api that return types with arguments of type Group 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Group> Group.getEffectiveParents()
      Returns this group's current calculated parent groups, including itself
      Collection<Group> GroupManager.getGroups()
      Gets all groups tracked.
      Set<Group> User.getGroups()
      Gets a backed set of groups from which this user inherits.
      Set<Group> Group.getParents()
      Gets a set of backed groups from which this group inherits.
      Methods in space.arim.perms.api with parameters of type Group 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean GroupManager.addGroup(Group group)
      Adds a Group, overriding potential existing entires.
      boolean User.addGroup(Group group)
      Adds this user to the specified group.
      boolean Group.addParent(Group parent)
      Adds another group as a parent of this one.
      boolean User.removeGroup(Group group)
      Removes this user from the specified group.
      boolean Group.removeParent(Group parent)
      Removes another group as a parent of this one.
